summary: It is 80's Turkey, local musicians of Adiyaman are hired by the military and trained to welcome one of the forceful generals of coup regime.
cast: Cezmi Baskin|Özgü Namal|Umut Kurt|Nazmi Kirik|Bahri Beyat|Meral Okay|Dilber Ay|Sahin Irmak|Oktay Kaynarca|Burak Tamdogan|Ibrahim Bozguney|Caner Cindoruk|Tuba Erdem|Erdal Gülver|Tamer Güven|Mahmut Hazim Kisakürek|Murat Sürücü|Gülhan Tekin|Mehmet Tekkanat|Bekir Turan|Özlem Türkad|Nazif Uslu|Ali Fuat Önder|Sirri Süreyya Önder
director: Directors: Muharrem Gulmez, Sirri Süreyya Önder
title: Beynelmilel
